content.heading: Introduction
content.body: PropYouLike is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website or services.

content.heading: Data We Collect
content.body: We collect personal information such as name, phone number, email address when users submit inquiry forms or interact with our lead generation tools.

content.heading: How We Use Your Data
content.body: Your information is used to contact you regarding your property inquiries, project updates, and related real estate services. We may share your details with our verified real estate partners when needed.

content.heading: Third-Party Tools
content.body: We may use tools such as Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, LinkedIn Insight Tag, and Privyr to improve user experience and track marketing performance.

content.heading: Your Rights
content.body: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us at the email provided.
